@HHbruichladdich Ooo, will do!

gay people, lesbians, trans people, punks, bohemians and people who just hate your shit; they like to fuck up the established order of things too. So you can build your conspiracy theories. And you can lionise political operators. But we will burn down your temples.

So the Alex Salmond thing is not a surprise. The revolution will not be televised and the revolution will NOT be feminist. But a word of advice. Women have a good track record of fucking up the established order. And all those "others"; immigrants, people of colour,
And if these Difficult Women draw attention to problems with Very Important Men; then they are trouble, spies, agents, whatever fucking thing. This happens, ALWAYS.
They say to women; your weird special interest concerns will be addressed... AFTER the glorious revolution. So shut up, put up, women's issue are bourgeois or minority or JUST SHUT UP.
Whatever revolution some people want; nationalist, socialist, fascist, whatever, the absolute constant, the thing they always ALWAYS have in common is the shutting down of women. Always.
